c-0: ^You slowly lift the lid, peering inside with caution.
c-1: ^You shake the box. Something liquid sloshes around inside.
c-2: ^You kick the box open! The lid flies off.

found_item: ^Inside, you find a bottle of Fruit Juice!

c-0:
^You put the Fruit Juice in your inventory.

^This will restore some health when consumed.
c-1: ^You decide to leave the Fruit Juice for now.
^You can always come back for it later.
